java/liquibase/ant/ChangeLogSyncTask.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00004 import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
00005 
00006 import java.io.Writer;
00007 
00008 public class ChangeLogSyncTask extends BaseLiquibaseTask {
00009 
00010     public void execute() throws BuildException {
00011 
00012         Liquibase liquibase = null;
00013         try {
00014             liquibase = createLiquibase();
00015 
00016             Writer writer = createOutputWriter();
00017             if (writer == null) {
00018                 liquibase.changeLogSync(getContexts());
00019             } else {
00020                 liquibase.changeLogSync(getContexts(), writer);
00021                 writer.flush();
00022                 writer.close();
00023             }
00024 
00025         } catch (Exception e) {
00026             throw new BuildException(e);
00027         } finally {
00028             closeDatabase(liquibase);
00029         }
00030     }
00031 }
